name: HelloJasper
tagline: A yet another Hello World program for JasperReport
body:
###TutorialsDojo.com

###1. What's this? 
 
   - This is a Hello World JasperReport example. 


###2. What does this program do? 

   - It will say 'Hello Sensei!' using the JasperReport library and the hellojasper.jrxml configuration file. 


###3. Who wrote this? 

	Author: Jon Bonso
	Email:  sensei@tutorialsdojo.com
	

###4. When is this created/modified?

   September 11, 2014	-	First Release.
   
   

###Tutorial Link: 
http://tutorialsdojo.com/java/hello-world-jasperreport-pdf-example/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
